items.sentence: We've got to get a move on if we want to finish today.
I just hope that Tom stays awake until Mary gets home.
I hope that Tom didn't tell anybody about what we did.
It's difficult for me to express my thoughts in words.
Tom and Mary just don't seem to communicate very well.
I'm the only person who can probably help Tom do that.
I found it difficult to solve that problem right away.
I remember reading about those twins in the newspaper.
Tom bragged about how well his son is doing at school.
Tom hasn't been able to convince Mary to go on a diet.
